author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
For testing of development versions of Geant4 it is needed to update CMSSW code:
   - extra flags for geometry is now set;
   - tracking interface class  is moved from Application to Physics sub-directory;
   - Printouts in Physics Lists are extended.
No change in any WF is expected.


#### PR validation:
private

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for: NO
title: [FULLSIM] Updates for Geant4 11.3 testing
